Buying this was the best financial decision I have ever made.

This game is very unique as a "shooter".  You are shooting portals not people or things.  The portals create a dimensional space in which to move from one space or area to another.  Very unique and a different kind of mental challenge.  I found it fun, creative and very entertaining.

I absolutely love the concept of this game, but the execution could've been better. The game would do well to have a dedicated tutorial segment that's more elaborate with explaining things, and some of the achievements are a bit much. Despite that, it's all-in-all a fun time that I enjoyed none the less.

it's not big but it's very clever.
It's easy to put Portal in my top 10 all time games, the story, the atmosphere and the dark, dry comedy interspersed throughout and the sense of awe as you bounce and teleport in creative and imaginative ways.

I come back to this game for a play through every few years and it's still patched by Steam :)
